content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 tablespoons Jamaican jerk seasoning blend" )

content.text: 1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, diced
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, diced" )

content.text: 0) Place the jerk seasoning, oil, garlic, ginger, green onions, and jalapeno slices in a blender, and blend until thick and smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the jerk seasoning"@9:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oil"@29:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "ginger"@42:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "green onions"@50:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "jalapeno slices"@68:83 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a blender"@87:96 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "blend"@102:107 / AC
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until thick and smooth"@108:130 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Dunk wings in the mixture, and arrange in single layer on baking sheets.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Dunk"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "wings"@8:13 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the mixture"@17:28 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "arrange"@34:41 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "baking sheets"@61:74 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "single layer"@45:57 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cover with aluminum foil, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-2-0 "aluminum foil"@14:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "refrigerate"@33:44 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "8 hours"@45:52 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-2-1 "overnight"@57:66 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-3-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "300 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-3-1 "150 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Bake wings 2 hours in the preheated oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "wings"@8:13 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "2 hours"@14:21 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "the preheated oven"@25:43 / TOOL )
	)
)
